amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 118-3 to clarify that nothing in the underlying bill impacts the CDC order requiring a pre-departure COVID-19 test for people traveling from the People's Republic of China.
amendment.purpose: Amendment clarifies that nothing in the underlying bill impacts the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention order requiring negative COVID-19 tests for proof of recovery from COVID-19 for travelers coming from the People's Republic of China.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rose amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 426 - 8 (Roll no. 113).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Rose.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rose amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 426 - 8 (Roll no. 113).
